title: Unscarred
description: It is finally our time.He’s an outlaw. The president of the Atlanta charter of the Unacceptables MC.I’m his old lady – devoted, strong, and ready for anything.But was I ready for what was coming?Everything was perfect, or so it seemed.It wasn’t until a bone chilling knock at our door that I considered running.Our perfect life was about to be shattered.He’d do anything to protect me and his club. But was it enough to really keep everyone safe?Please note: This is meant for audiences that are 18+ for sexual situations, language, and adult content. This story is not for the faint of heart! But if gore, violence, and extreme sexual situations are your cup of tea, this is the read for you.Unscarred is a followup to Unbearable, but can be read as a standalone. Find Unbearable here: amzn.to/2yySK6RUnbearable and Unscarred are crossovers between Author Fiona Davenport’s Yeah, Baby series and Kristen Hope Mazzola's Unacceptables MC Series.
author: Kristen Hope Mazzola
